QuestData.Title: The Lesson of the Balanced Rock
QuestData.Description: I require peace to perform my meditation. Practice your arts while I meditate on Shu's location.$B$BOther monks practice balance and combat upon the balance poles in the surrounding pools. Engage them and defeat them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 6 Tushui Monks atop the balance poles.
QuestData.RewardText: Even now, your skills increase. Your footing becomes more sure. Your blows strike with more force.$B$BDiscipline and practice are the keys to reaching our full potential.
